scripts.__prepare-folder: rimraf dist && copyfiles LICENSE manifest.json dist && copyup public/images/icon128.png public/* dist && cp -R public/themes dist
scripts.__prepare-folder-develop: npm run __prepare-folder && cp -R public/integration dist && node --import ./register.js ./env/set-client-id.ts dist/manifest.json
scripts.develop-watch: npm run develop && chokidar "src/**/*.(ts|tsx|json)" "public/**/*.(html|css)" -c "[[ {path} == src* ]] && npm run __develop-core;[[ {path} == public* ]] && copyup {path} dist"
scripts.build: npm run __prepare-folder && npm run __check-types && NODE_ENV=production node --import ./register.js ./build.ts
